description: Double down on this two-sided 36" x 18" casino gaming mat! One side features a classic craps betting layout, while the flip side shows off a blackjack table felt. Simply roll the mat onto any table and transform it into a convenient, classy gaming area. Perfect for apartments or anyone without a fancy poker table, this mat still has plenty of space to lay your cards, stack your chips, and watch those dice come out the hard way.

This 2mm thick felt table mat feels great to the touch: not too velvety and not too rough. Aside from the useful, space-saving playmat, we've included a set of printed instruction cards for everybody from blackjack rookies to craps masters.
